title: E-Learning Practice Competency Enhancement: Adaptive Scaffolding Learning Program Based on Medical Emergency Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will solve at least six diverse medical emergency scenarios with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners will improve self-monitoring and help-seeking strategies by at least 70% using in-game real-time feedback.
Learners will achieve at least 4 points on a 5-level evaluation scale for emergency care procedure application in comprehensive assessments conducted every two weeks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
